cause.description:
an attempt to tell the stories of the sailors, past and present, of the merchant marine. It is a story that has been untold for years and, with support, can finally come to the light and be recognized for what it is, one of the greatest chapters in American History.
1. WWII could not have been won without the merchant marine
2. The Merchant Marine is essential to a global economy
3. 90% of all goods imported to the US are Carried on merchant ships
cause.mission: Educate America about the contributions merchant mariners make to our society
cause.name: Merchant Marine
